attributes.action: repeal of the current drink licensing act.
attributes.additional_details: The current drink licensing hours are not in the country's best interest, nor are they condusive to maintaining a healthy responsible population. The current laws also contribute to increasing levels of demand on Health Service facilities and Policing. For these reasons the government needs to repeal the  present acts and revert to the provisions of the previous laws covering the licensing hours. Thereby effectively to reduce the number of hours in which alcohol may currently be purchased by the general public..
